import React from 'react' import "./Summary.css" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { incrementProductsAmount,decrementProductsAmount,removeFromCart } from '../../Store/cart/cartSlice' const SummaryCard = ({product}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{/*

{product.name}

{product.amount}
{`${product.price}`}
*/}
) } export default SummaryCard
